item.title: Test Post
item.description:
Welcome to My Blog!

This is the first post in my new blog. I will be sharing my thoughts on programming, technology, and more.

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Welcome to My Blog!

Hi there! I’m dubdub, and this is a space where I document my thoughts, experiences, and explorations. Here, you’ll find my reflections on a variety of topics, including programming, technology, life, and my personal interests. My goal is to share the knowledge and insights I’ve gained in fields such as hardware design, software development, and engineering optimization.

Who Am I?

I¡¯m a passionate engineer with a background in both hardware and software development, focusing particularly on high-level synthesis (HLS), embedded systems, FPGA, and CPU design. I enjoy exploring new technologies, solving complex problems, and sharing my learning process with others.
